document_data.name: Oman Moonwell
document_data.mainbody: The '''Oman Moonwell''' was the magical pool of water found on [[Oman's Isle]] within the the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles|11}}
document_data.Description: The Moonwell was located within the [[Old Stone Wood]] forest near the [[cairn of Thelgaar Ironhand]] on the western side of the island.
document_data.History: During the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], an [[orc]] [[shaman]] named [[Crughth]] planned to corrupt the [[moonwell]] so he could use it as a portal to the other Moonwells scattered throughout the Moonshae Isles, allowing the wicked [[giant]]s who ruled the island to move their minions about for raids.
